title: Backlash (CRE228)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the twenty eighth episode of our second season, Adam Savage of Mythbusters, the Sklar Brothers, and Jenny Slate tell stories of times they acted out... and got it right back in the face.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (the Sklar Brothers, Kevin Allison, Jenny Slate, Adam Savage, Ill Gates, Letting Up Despite Great Faults, Butch Walker and the Black Widows, Beautiful Vision, Go Home Productions, Jeff Barr)
